articles.description: Preview, live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Leicester City vs Tottenham Hotspur in the Premier League
articles.title: Leicester vs Tottenham LIVE: Premier League score, line-ups, commentary, stats & latest updates

articles.description: Chelsea agree a fee in principle for Atletico Madrid forward Joao Felix, with Conor Gallagher moving in the other direction as part of the deal.
articles.title: Chelsea agree fee for Joao Felix to allow Gallagher to join Atleti

articles.description: With the close of the transfer window less than two weeks away, BBC Sport looks at the possible moves that could still happen.
articles.title: Transfer deadline day: Could Raheem Sterling, Ivan Toney, Jarrad Branthwaite, Jadon Sancho, Romelu Lukaku and Scott McTominay be on the move?

articles.description: Track cyclist Matt Richardson, who won three medals for Australia at the Paris Olympics, switches nationality and will now represent Great Britain.
articles.title: Matt Richardson: Australian Olympian joins Great Britain cycling team

articles.description: England name Matthew Potts in their side as an extra seamer for the first Test against Sri Lanka at Emirates Old Trafford on Wednesday.
articles.title: England v Sri Lanka: Matthew Potts in hosts' XI for first Test

articles.description: Former Manchester City captain Ilkay Gundogan could leave Barcelona after just one full season.
articles.title: Ilkay Gundogan: Former Man City captain could leave Barcelona this summer

articles.description: Tottenham accept a bid from newly promoted Leicester for midfielder Oliver Skipp.
articles.title: Oliver Skipp: Tottenham accept Leicester bid for midfielder

articles.description: After four years of The Hundred, outside investment is coming and the tournament could look very different come 2025.
articles.title: The Hundred: What is next for tournament with big changes expected?

articles.description: Thierry Henry leaves his role as France Under-21s manager after winning silver at the Olympic Games.
articles.title: Thierry Henry steps down as France Under-21s manager after winning Olympic silver

articles.description: Belgium's Wout van Aert retains his overall lead at the Vuelta a Espana with a powerful sprint finish to win stage three on Monday.
articles.title: Vuelta a Espana: Wout van Aert sprints to stage three victory
